items.title: The great cognitive migration: How AI is reshaping human purpose, work and meaning
items.description: Humans need to embrace domains where AI still falters, and where human creativity, ethics and emotion emain indispensable.

items.title: Not everything needs an LLM: A framework for evaluating when AI makes sense
items.description: The answer to 'What customer needs requires an AI solution?' isnâ€™t always 'Yes.' LLMs are still expensive and not always accurate.

items.title: RSAC 2025: Why the AI agent era means more demand for CISOS
items.description: RSAC 2025 made one thing clear: AI agents are entering security workflows, but boards want proof they work.

items.title: OpenAI overrode concerns of expert testers to release sycophantic GPT-4o
items.description: Once again, it shows the importance of incorporating more domains beyond the traditional math and computer science into AI development.

items.title: Roblox breaks ground on data center in Brazil for early 2026
items.description: At Gamescom Latam, Roblox announced it has broken ground on a new data center in Brazil -- slated to go live in early 2026.
